content: fundamental shawl designed by melissa beyer knittymelissa on ravelry this shawl pattern is written for beginner knitters as a relatively easy project encompassing stockinette garter ribbing simple lace and directional i e right and left leaning increases and decreases it is worked flat using circular needles because it is intended for a new knitter who may have limited supplies and/or abilities the pattern is written as simply as possible and includes detailed instructions and explanations it also calls for 300 grams of yarn in order to be a manageable size shawlette but more yarn can be used for a larger shawl yarn is juniper moon farm moonshine chunky ©knittymelissa melissa beyer 2022 fundamental shawl - 1 do not copy sell or distribute without permission size approximately 50x24 wingspan & spine measurements as written after gentle blocking the size of the shawl will vary based on each individual s gauge as well as the amount of yarn available the basic structure can be repeated as many times as desired more yarn means a larger shawl the shawl may also grow when blocked gauge spi stitches per inch 12 sts in 4 of stockinette rpi row per inch 16 row in 4 of stockinette gauge measured over 4 tends to be more accurate than if measured over 1 or 2 materials 300 grams 270-340 yards bulky weight yarn for a small to medium shawlette there is a huge range of thickness among bulky weight yarns try to find one that is around 100 yds per 100 grams and fits into the yardage range given above note that some yarns labeled super bulky may also fit into the range designer used juniper moon farm moonshine chunky seen on p4 use additional yarn for a larger shawl 500-600 grams us size 13 9 mm 32 circular needle or longer 4 stitch markers that fit around your needles 1 locking stitch marker yarn is knit picks main line in cocoa ©knittymelissa melissa beyer 2022 fundamental shawl - 2 do not copy sell or distribute without permission stitch key & abbreviations … repeated instructions repeat everything in parenthesis as instructed bobble bind off co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together left-leaning decrease k2tog-tbl knit 2 sts together through their back loops decrease kfb knit into the front of the stitch but do not remove it from the left needle then knit into the back of the same stitch increase m marker m1l make 1 left left-leaning increase using the left needle lift the horizontal strand between the needles from front to back knit picked up strand through the back loop to twist it to remember which way to pick up the strand i use the mnemonic i left through the front door left and front both have the letter f m1r make 1 right right-leaning increase - using the left needle lift the horizontal strand between the needles from back to front knit picked up strand through the front loop to twist it
